entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
